name: jslib
description: A collection of functional utility libraries for JS projects

scripts.clean: npm cache clean && rimraf node_modules doc typings coverage dist
scripts.docs: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME docs && cd docs && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push git@github.com:zhenwenc/jslib gh-pages --force
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && babel dist/src -s --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir lib && rsync -avm --include='*.d.ts' -f 'hide,! */' dist/src/ lib && cp typings-ext.d.ts lib

author: Zhenwen Cai <frederickcai@gmail.com>
